name: videodestroyer
description: absolutely destroy the quality of video files

scripts.build: deno compile -A --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o ./dist/VideoDestroyer.exe ./index.js && deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o ./dist/VideoDestroyer-MacOS-Intel ./index.js && deno compile -A --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o ./dist/VideoDestroyer-MacOS-M1 ./index.js && deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o ./dist/VideoDestroyer-Linux ./index.js

author: artifish
